        static void JoinServer(java.lang.String strServer,
                       java.lang.String strPass,

        Joins the given server and starts the game.
        Parameters:
        strServer - The server to join
        strPass - The server's password
        ctx - The application context handler

      • ServerJoinComplete

        static void ServerJoinComplete(int nID,
                               boolean bRoundStarted,
                               int nColor,
                               android.content.Context ctx)
        DESCRIPTION: Called after ServerSync.PopulateFromServer, when the player ID is obtained but before other player IPs are received POST-CONDITION: The Player's color will be set to a random color received from the server. The Player's name will be set to the name they chose. The Player's ID will be received from the server. The Server synchronization process will then be started. The player will spectate if the round already started.
        Parameters:
        nID - Your player's ID
        bRoundStarted - Whether the round has started when you joined
        nColor - Your player's color
        ctx - The application context handler

        static void TouchUpdated(float fX,

        Called when Layout_Game_Draw is touched.
        Parameters:
        fX - The X position that was touched
        fY - The Y position that was touched

      • GameLoop

        static void GameLoop(long lDrawDelta,
                     android.graphics.Canvas canvas,
                     android.content.Context ctx)
        Game loop, called in Layout_Game_Draw.
        Parameters:
        lDrawDelta - The time since the last loop iteration
        canvas - The layout's canvas
        ctx - The application's context handler
